name: 'Cancel' BUTTON is hiding 'Rooms' block.
description: Check that clicking the“Cancel” button under the Calendar block, which contains Calendar itself, “First Name”, “Last Name”, “Email”, “Phone” fields, “Book” and “Cancel” buttons, is hiding this entire block including fields and buttons.
